```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("TextMessages.csv")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df_long <- df %>% pivot_longer(cols = c(Baseline, Six_months), names_to = "Time", values_to = "Text_Count")

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(df_long, aes(x = Group, y = Text_Count, fill = Group)) + geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap(~ Time) + labs(title = "Text Messages by Group and Time", x = "Group", y = "Number of Text Messages") + theme_minimal() + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"))
```
